AI Description: Fiona is a Python library for reading and writing geospatial vector data formats.
Core Features: Support For Various Gis File Formats Such As Shapefile, Geojson, Kml, Gpkg, & Others, Integration With Ogr (Simple Features Library) For Efficient Data Access, Ability To Read & Write Vector Data With Support For Geometry Manipulation, Designed For Easy Interaction With Geospatial Data In Python Applications
General Tags: Python Library, Geospatial Data, Gis, Vector Data
